resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this object?
This will start a new track. Proceed?
This will stop and save the current track. Proceed?
"Do you want to delete the taken image from the gallery?"
"Tags must be separated by a comma"
Please connect your device to the internet
Username or Password may be incorrect
Please connect your device to the internet.
Sorry, your device has no supported camera.
No Location found. Turn on location service.
Cannot find the right Tag. Try Again.
No sensor data available. Try to start again beginning from the map.

All sensors are ready to go. If one or more sensors are broken a yellow exclamation mark or a red cross will appear. Clicking on it will give information how to fix the sensors. Warnings can be ignored, but that can result in wrong data for the calculation and could give wrong results of the mapped objects.

Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Magnetometer has calibrationlevel 0 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. Remove all magnets from phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Magnetometer has calibrationlevel 1 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. Remove all magnets from phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Magnetometer has calibrationlevel 2 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. Remove all magnets from phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Accelerometer has calibrationlevel 0 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Accelerometer has calibrationlevel 1 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.

Accelerometer has calibrationlevel 2 out of 3. Please slowly rotate your phone around all its axis 3 times. And/Or draw an eight shaped figure with your phone. If that does not help restart your phone. You can always take these measurements for recalibration of these sensors. Ignoring this warning can result in bad calculation and wrong data.
the Data4All app is still running.
